basics.name: Shashank Sharma
basics.label: Fullstack Developer
basics.summary: Over the past 8 years I have frequently challenged myself with new languages, frameworks and methodologies. My core language has always been javascript but not limitied to it. I had also worked as a Python, Java, Android & iOS developer building games, user interfaces, backend & business applications for various devices and formfactors. In my current role I am working as Fullstack developer and cloud consultant, working on a ReactJS Business application. I have a very strong interest in full stack javascript development and have recently been doing the same from a couple of years. I have experience using build tools such as Grunt & webpack. I also belive in Test Based developement and I invest good amount of time in automating every aspects of testing including unit, end to end & Gui tesing to name a few. In my most recent roles I have been exposed to enterprise Agile development and received training in live projects.

work.summary: I am working on a Large Business Application based on Reactjs for front end and nodejs for backend web-apis. This application has various components used for visualization of different IOT products parameters LIVE.
highlights: Live rendering of data using HTML5-Canvas & D3

work.summary: Wiseup is an E-Commerce application where you book professional electricians and electrical products online. Wiseup technology stack includes AngularJS, Bootstrap, Expressjs, nodejs and grunt. I developed both frontend and backend-webapis to support the infrastructure. The product had a pilot launch in 2015 in Sweden and it has been a good success.

DLNA implementation for SONY smart phones
Smart TV application based on Javascript framework
